data.title: Eminent art director Milan Fernandez dies during shoot of Ajith Kumar’s movie ‘Vidaamuyarchi’ at Azerbaijan
data.meta_description: Fernandez  was working on Tamil superstar Ajith's upcoming film 'Vidaamayurchi' in Azerbaijan, when he complained of feeling uneasy.
data.text:
Synopsis

Fernandez was working on Tamil superstar Ajith's upcoming film 'Vidaamayurchi' in Azerbaijan, when he complained of feeling uneasy.

Milan Fernandez, one of Kollywood's most prominent art directors (Tamil film industry), passed away on October 15. He was in his early ‘50s.

#Budget' 2024 with ET

Budget Highlights: Your 2-minute guide

Tax tweaks, jobs & more: All that FM announced in Budget

FM 's plan for Viksit Bharat: A look at key numbers

Fernandez was working on Tamil superstar Ajith Kumar’s next project ‘Vidaamuyarchi’ in Azerbaijan.

According to a Times Of India report, the art director suffered a cardiac arrest that proved to be fatal. In the morning he met his team for work as usual. However, later he complained of a vague sense of uneasiness and was also sweating profusely. As his condition deteriorated, the team, which included Ajith and director Magizh Thirumeni, rushed him to the hospital. However, he died on the way.

Fernandez is survived by a wife and a son who was reportedly assisting him during the movie's shooting.

Lyca Productions, who is bankrolling the project, took to social media to express condolences over the late art director. “Our sincere and deepest condolences to our Art Director @MilanFern30 May his soul Rest In Peace. Our prayers are with his family & beloved ones (folded hands emoticon)" reads the tweet.

Fernandez, a veteran in Kollywood, had worked in over 30 movies as an art director. Some of his notable works include, ‘Billa’, ‘Velayudham’, ‘Veeram’, ‘Vettaikaaran’, ‘Thunivu’, ‘Endrendrum Punnagai’, ‘Vedalam, Annaaththe’, ‘Pathu Thala’ etc.
